member.summary: Summary: Describes the state of an entity modified

members.member: Summary: The entity is being tracked by the context and exists in the database, and its property values have not changed from the values in the database.
Summary: The entity is being tracked by the context but does not yet exist in the database.
Summary: The entity is being tracked by the context and exists in the database, but has been marked for deletion from the database the next time SaveChanges is called.
Summary: The entity is being tracked by the context and exists in the database, and some or all of its property values have been modified.

member.summary: Modalità di campionamento variabili di processo

member.name: F:Atys.PowerMES.ComparisonType.None
member.summary: Default

member.name: F:Atys.PowerMES.ComparisonType.DeltaAbsolute
member.summary: Il nuovo valore acquisito deve essere maggiore o minore di un delta rispetto ad un valore fisso

member.name: F:Atys.PowerMES.ComparisonType.InRange
member.summary: Valore attuale deve essere incluso tra i due valori di riferimento (estremi inclusi)

member.name: F:Atys.PowerMES.ComparisonType.OutOfRange
member.summary: Valore attuale deve essere al di fuori dei due valori di riferimento (estremi inclusi)

member.name: F:Atys.PowerMES.ComparisonType.GreaterOrEqualThan
member.summary: Valore attuale deve essere maggiore o uguale del valore di riferimento 1

member.name: F:Atys.PowerMES.ComparisonType.LessOrEqualThan
member.summary: Valore attuale deve essere minore o uguale del valore di riferimento 1

member.name: F:Atys.PowerMES.ComparisonType.Equal
member.summary: Valore attuale deve essere uguale al valore di riferimento 1
